Reviews.Content: stayed ambassador transit hotel overnight times transit indonesia comfortable facilties short stay reception staff friendly helpful changi airport world plenty shops restaurants plenty definitely stay

Reviews.Content: tired coming wait flight home morning singapore city tiring transit hotel easily accessible expensive rest terminal complete facility midnight difficulty finding food choice en suite normal budget common bath toilet

Reviews.Content: booked online via website received confirmation booking 48hours 57 australian 6 hour block time easy level 3 checkin 337 twin bedded bathroom flatscreen tv kettle teacoffee sachets tv reception poor channels reception informed staff yes quality tv picture isnt bed narrow comfortable bathroom wasnt mould bathtub unpleasant ok 6 hours fairly quiet noise inconsiderate guests talking loudly hallway wakeup call reminder call 10 mins main airport noisy lights bright near midnight flight australia stayed terminal 3 transit hotel nicer

Reviews.Title: “Efficient shoe box accommodation”
Reviews.Author: Tweetgw
Reviews.Content: dreading overnight changi id read reviews unfriendly airport staff decided instead sleeping airport worry photographic equipment etc id book transit hotel frills accommodation provided private bathroom communal cheaper option tv kettle morning coffee tea cost 78 10 hour flight auckland perfect bedding clean bed lie horizontal exhausted slept definitely recommend stay overnight wake call ok window view sleeping

Reviews.Title: “Noisy, rude and grotty”
Reviews.Author: Pennart
Reviews.Content: stopover singapore waste money staying t2 6 hourly blocks additional hour charges building night incredibly noisy bathroom black hairs tub bed staff care informed disappointment

Reviews.Content: check confusing told free 0930 reservation located key hotel 3 single beds air con teacoffee facilities shower window fine stopover catch sleep flights overall hotel stock biscuits tea coffee facilities

Reviews.Title: “Don't expect too much!”
Reviews.Author: BorneoGeorge
Reviews.Content: convenient overnight transit catch morning flight changi plentiful shops eateries duty free lounge window request hair dryer paste carpet bit sticky bring own slippers renovation 1am 5am drilling sounds kept interrupting sleep despite using pair ear plugs

Reviews.Title: “Good for short stopover.”

Reviews.Content: seven hour stopover hotel offered chance bit sleep basic fridge tv shower beds bit 62 frame firm noise guess excitement flight penang morning meant little sleep woke 12 hour alarm flight gate hotel starbucks popular breakfast transiting didnt worry changing singapore currency credit card

Reviews.Content: cant remember exactly stayed terminal 1 2 hotel easy easy check sleep flight morning booking via emailing hotel confirmed youre worried leaving luggage transit airline desk told arrived airline bags transferred flight morning appeared day service

Reviews.Content: arrived singapore airport 200 am hours kids shut eye hotel books 6 hr block shower toilet bed clean friendly service booking 2 worth money arrived fresh day destination

Reviews.Content: found hotel useful late night stopover checkin quick difficult actual hotel terminal wake call time ideal catching sleep easier leaving airport hotel quiet night roombathroom clean complaints shower services terminal 3 home handy freshen boarding flight especially town day bathrooms nice hairdryer facilities

Reviews.Title: “Great value for long stopover”
Reviews.Author: MelbournePoppy023
Reviews.Content: option daytime stopover singapore 15 hours kill singapore arrival basic 6 hours minimum costs usd30 add additional hours hour rate perfect sleep windows single bed nice clean linen tv bottle water towel provided shared showers clean soap shampoo etc provided excellent value private facilities arrived prebook definitely worthwhile stopover arduous

Reviews.Title: “Singapore Airport transit hotel”
Reviews.Author: jimmyd3
Reviews.Content: location ambassador transit hotel – singapore airport remarks flight arrived 1030pm departing flight due leave 930am morning transferring city night accommodation – transit hotel airport collect luggage pass customs immigration easy ready arrival clean quiet excellent value night’s sleep checkin checkout quick courteous recommend hotel travellers extended waiting time departure

Reviews.Title: “Economical but a bit congested”

Reviews.Content: night layover changi transit hotel perfect catch sleep fresh morning flight basic clean price economical windows kinda claustrophobic feel spend hours catch sleep

Reviews.Title: “When you have 8 hours at the airport in the middle of the night, ths sure beats sleeping in the concourse chairs.”
Reviews.Author: JimInColorado
Reviews.Content: nice wellappointed usually budget accommodations relatively luxurious little pricey comfortable convenient arrived midnight flew morning desk staff efficient friendly changi airport frequent trains terminals pretty easy navigate remember stay hotel connecting flights immigration collect checked bags toothbrush carryon bags

Reviews.Title: “Every airport should have a hotel like this”
Reviews.Author: Pejola
Reviews.Content: fantastic idea sleep arriving late night waiting flight special sleep freshen pay hour fantastic running hotel hotel cheaper crowne plaza attached airport covers staying layover flights extremely dark night quiet booked 9 hours wonderful rest time paid lights power recommend travelling singapore airport ensure book hotel books quiet quickly

Reviews.Title: “Does the trick”
Reviews.Author: swglobetrotter
Reviews.Content: transit hotel dont expect fantastic found expectations met clean shower water pressure lots teacoffee selections electric jug hot water bed comfortable extra pillows housekeeping ladies extra promptly 6 hours sleep hotel provided word warning book advance bring print confirmation guest checking time name 1st receptionist told booked travelling child didnt print thankfully 2nd receptionist guests checking time

Reviews.Title: “It's great !!”
Reviews.Author: singhi
Reviews.Content: typing t3 am happy ritz town stay clean hot shower sleep tv quick easy checkin excellent rating achieves exactly facilities stay town airport break flights definitely stay downstairs free internet restaurants shopping rate hotel royal orchid sheraton etc bed hot shower quiet 10 10 book extra time connection 6 hours booked lots 6 hours fine

Reviews.Title: “Room old & tired but when you are tired too it is heaven!”
Reviews.Author: Wildman_Aussie
Reviews.Content: agree looked uninviting opted 2 beds child bathroom clean shower hot powerful bed seen days pillows bothered seen days soon closed eyes wake call reception didnt hear noise fire alarms started woke broadcast call false alarm quick call reception confirmed werent die escape proven difficult windows jump

Reviews.Title: “really dirty”
Reviews.Author: annuk
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel enroute bali grubby bathroom horrid dirty dirt tiles sink etc total revamp bucket bleach start unclean sleeping bed concept sadly cleanlines recommend avoid hotel

Reviews.Title: “YOU PAY FOR WHAT YOU GET -NOT THAT MUCH-”
Reviews.Author: HOTELLMEMORE
Reviews.Content: hesitating lot booking block 6 hours property stopover singapore’s changi airport considering terrible reviews left travellers inspecting hearing neither particular bothering noise nor experiencing specific disturbances eventually checked peaceful rest admit t2 somewhat worn due intense dirty bathroom compartment 2 sqm tiny shower hose extremely short easy unless dwarf guess designed save water checkin checkout expedited thanks reception attendants available time overall satisfactory stay inspect checkingin prevent major disappointment
